title:
My reporter,

Can you tell me who owns HUGH MACRAE PARK?

The Macrae family?

City?

County?

I have lived here just curious,please assist.with thanks!
text:
New Hanover County lists Hugh MacRae Park as one of its parks.



Here's a link to the county parks site:
http://www.nhcgov.com/Parks/Pages/mapspage.aspx?Select=11
